sql: SELECT MIN(mi.info) AS release_date, MIN(t.title) AS modern_internet_movie FROM aka_title ak, movie_companies mc, movie_info mi, movie_keyword mk, title t WHERE mi.note like '%internet%' AND mi.info is not NULL AND (mi.info like 'USA:% 199%' OR mi.info like 'USA:% 200%') AND t.production_year < 2006 AND t.id = ak.movie_id AND t.id = mi.movie_id AND t.id = mk.movie_id AND t.id = mc.movie_id ;
hint_str:
/*+ HashJoin(mc mk mi t ak)
 HashJoin(mk mi t ak)
 HashJoin(mi t ak)
 HashJoin(mi t)
 BitmapScan(mc)
 SeqScan(mk)
 SeqScan(mi)
 TidScan(t)
 BitmapScan(ak)
 Leading((mc (mk ((mi t) ak)))) */
